title: Science for life
creator_credit: Knight Films and Peace Committee of the Society of Friends (Quakers)
brief_description: A teenage schoolboy is engaged in the quest for scientific knowledge. Two senior scientists bring the boy face to face with the challeng of - science to what end - life or death? A straightforward dramatisation of a debate intended to arouse lively and useful discussion for teenage audiences.
